description:
Anything is the fastest way to build apps. Now, from your iPhone on the go. 

Free to start. Join 1M builders using Anything to launch. 

BUILD APPS WITHOUT CODING

Describe your app. Anything builds it. Mobile apps, web, or both. 

Launch on the App Store or host on the web in 1 tap.

Preview live on your device, then continue editing, exporting or launching from your browser.

SHIPS MOBILE APPS & WEB

- Native iOS mobile apps or web apps
- Live preview on your device
- 1-tap App Store submit (only from web)
- Instant web hosting
- Build from anywhere, sync everywhere (finish later from your browser)
- Export your code (only from web)

DESIGNS THAT POP

- Like you had a designer, not AI
- Dark mode supported by default
- Responsive by default

EVERYTHING BUILT IN

- Add powerful features to your apps in seconds
- AI - ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini (no API keys)
- Payments - In-app payments with RevenueCat, Stripe subscriptions, and more
- Auth - Email, Google, Facebook, X
- Database - Postgres 
- Backend - APIs, uploads, hosting
- 100+ integrations

AI AGENT THAT WORKS FOR YOU

- Thinks through your prompts
- Fixes errors on its own
- Stays reliable as projects scale

Find us on the web: createanything.com 
Follow us on X: https://x.com/anythingai

There’s a lot you can do on GitHub that doesn’t require a complex development environment – like sharing feedback on a design discussion, or reviewing a few lines of code. GitHub for iOS lets you move work forward wherever you are. Stay in touch with your team, triage issues, and even merge, right from the app. We’re making these tasks easy for you to perform, no matter where you work, with a beautifully native experience.

You can use GitHub for iOS to:

• Browse your latest notifications
• Read, react, and reply to Issues and Pull Requests
• Review and merge Pull Requests
• Organize Issues with labels, assignees, projects, and more
• Browse your files and code
• Discover new and trending repositories

———

TestFlight makes it easy to test beta versions of apps and App Clips to provide valuable feedback to developers before they release their apps on the App Store. Developers can invite testers through email or a public link.

When you test a beta app or App Clip, Apple collects and sends crash logs, usage information and any feedback you submit to the developer. The developer may use this information to improve their app and related products. Apple may use crash logs and usage information to improve our products and services.

For instructions on installation, testing and feedback submission, and for details on how your data is handled, see testflight.apple.com.

The Ultimate Mobile Companion for Developers!

Our app revolutionizes the way developers work by bringing the full power of python coding directly to your mobile device. Designed with both seasoned programmers and aspiring coders in mind, our app offers an unparalleled mobile coding experience that is both efficient and accessible, no matter where you are.

Key Features:

- Seamless Execution: Run python scripts effortlessly with our optimized mobile interpreter. Whether you're debugging, learning, or prototyping, our app ensures your code runs smoothly on the go.
- AI Support: Get instant AI-powered assistance to debug your code, troubleshoot errors, and enhance your python skills effortlessly. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, the AI is here to help you write better code.
- Challenges: Sharpen your python skills with a collection of practical coding challenges, ranging from beginner-friendly tasks to advanced problem-solving exercises. Progress through different difficulty levels and master python coding style step by step.
- User-Friendly Interface: our app boasts an intuitive and clean interface designed for optimal coding efficiency on mobile devices. With customizable themes, fonts, and layouts, you can personalize your coding environment to suit your style.
- Advanced Code Editor: Our advanced code editor features syntax highlighting, code completion, and error detection, making coding on a small screen not just possible, but a pleasure.
- Cloud Sync and Storage: Save your work on the cloud with our integrated storage solutions. Access your python scripts anytime, anywhere, across all your devices.
- Community and Support: Join a growing community of mobile coders. Share tips, solve challenges, and get support from fellow developers. Our app is more than just an app; it's a movement towards mobile programming.

Our app is perfect for professionals looking to stay productive on the move, students learning programming outside the classroom, and anyone interested in data science, machine learning, or just coding for fun. With our app, your mobile device becomes a powerful coding workstation, enabling you to bring your ideas to life wherever you are.

Say goodbye to the constraints of desktop computing and hello to the freedom of mobile development with our app. Download now and start your coding adventure today!

We offer auto-renewing subscription:
- Length: Weekly-Monthly-Yearly
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- You will be able to access the Premium features of the app for the duration of the subscription
- Subscription automatically renews for the same price and duration period as the original period unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period
- You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription setting through your Apple account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged. Please visit https://support.apple.com/HT202039 for more information on how to proceed.
- You may turn off the auto-renewal of your subscription via your Apple Account Settings. However, you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period

Introducing the ultimate Python editor for iOS!
Enjoy a powerful, easy-to-use environment for coding in Python right from your iPhone or iPad.
Whether you’re new to coding or an experienced developer, you’ll love the intuitive interface and feature-packed design that makes programming simple and efficient.

With our Python editor, you can create, edit, and run Python scripts directly on iOS.
Features include syntax highlighting, auto-indentation, and code completion, helping you write clean, error-free code.
A built-in library of reusable snippets—plus the option to create your own—makes development faster than ever.

Designed to take full advantage of iOS, the app supports Liquid Glass API for a fluid, responsive coding experience, along with multi-window support, letting you work on multiple files or scripts side by side.
Use touch gestures to navigate, split your screen to view code and console simultaneously, and keep scripts running in the background while you multitask.

And now, with the integrated OpenAI Code Assistant, you can generate, refine, and debug Python code with AI-powered suggestions—directly inside the editor.

After a 3-day free trial, a subscription unlocks the complete experience:
- OpenAI Integration (with your API key)
- OpenAI Code Assistant
- Liquid Glass API & Multi-window support
- Editor customization
- Beautiful themes
- Complete Python guidebook
- Python learning resources

Pyto is an IDE for iPhone and iPad with a Python 3.10 Interpreter and all of the standard libraries plus more than 100 third party packages, as well as a C & C++ compiler and bitcode interpreter. Includes a terminal with standard UNIX commands, a code editor with code completion, support for Shortcuts, Picture in Picture, a graphical interface builder and a debugger.

* Full version exclusive third party modules *

- Cython, cryptography, typed_ast, cv2, _cffi_backend, kiwisolver, matplotlib, numpy, pandas, lxml, Bio, sklearn, skimage, scipy, erfa, pywt, nacl, bcrypt, statsmodels, zmq, regex, gensim, astropy, emd, wasm3, yaml

* Built-in UNIX commands *

- alias, awk, cat, chflags, chmod, cksum, clang, compress, cp, curl, date, diff, dig, du, egrep, env, fgrep, find, grep, gunzip, gzip, head, host, ifconfig, link, lli, llvm-link, ln, ls, md5, mkdir, mv, nc, nslookup, open, openurl, pbcopy, pbpaste, ping, printenv, pwd, readlink, rlogin, rm, rmdir, say, scp, sed, sftp, sort, ssh, ssh-keygen, stat, sum, tail, tar, tee, telnet, touch, tr, unalias, uname, uncompress, uniq, unlink, uptime, wc, whoami, whois, wol

Take advantage system features with the following modules:

  - pyto_ui - Build an user interface
  - widgets - Home Screen Widgets
  - file_system - iOS file system
  - notifications - Schedule notifications
  - remote_notifications - Receive remote notifications
  - background - Run code in background
  - pasteboard - Clipboard access
  - userkeys - Save values on disk
  - sound - Play sounds
  - music - Access the Apple Music library
  - photos - Accessing photos and the camera
  - location - Access user's location
  - motion - Motion sensors
  - multipeer - Peer to peer wireless connection
  - apps - Open third party apps
  - xcallback - Interact with other apps
  - sf_symbols - A list of SF Symbols names
  - watch - Complications and static user interfaces for the Apple Watch

This is a Python 3.13 learning tool for efficient learning, fast programming, local execution, breakpoint debugging, precise error reporting, Git fetching, iCloud access, and efficient transfer and sharing via LAN HTTP/FTP multi-point connections.
(^.^) It aspires to help you who want to learn, develop, or improve! ! ! (^.^)

* Download pure Python libraries from PyPI at your leisure.
* Read a variety of learning materials and run examples as you learn, making it easy to understand and efficient.
* Enjoy breakpoint debugging, precise error reporting, code templates, auto-suggestion, auto-indentation, code coloring, symbol completion, a symbol keyboard, text search, multi-file search, multi-line indentation, and multi-line comments, making development more convenient.

* Access iCloud easily, synchronize across multiple devices for efficient collaboration.
* Use Git to fetch source code projects from gitee.com and GitHub.
* Connect to a LAN or Bluetooth connection for efficient file transfer via HTTP/FTP multi-point connections.

* Easily search for learning materials using the built-in browser. Simply select code in the built-in browser to run it.
* Easily open file formats such as py, txt, pdf, chm, mp3, m4v, zip, gif, png, html, py, and doc through the file system.

* Easily adjust code color, font size, and line spacing for more comfortable reading.
* Customize background images and colors, text color and shadow, text font, text size, background animation, interface transition animation, and the number and order of tabs on the main interface to create your own personalized learning software.
* Easily generate QR codes for Python 3.13 scripts and learning materials, and scan them to access them.
* Easily share Python 3.13 scripts and learning materials via email, Weibo, Twitter, and Facebook.

Code templates - The contents of a new file will copy the contents of the code template.

Group Control APP is a free group control app software for iOS launched by PIA S5 Proxy. It can batch control hundreds of iOS mobile devices through PIA S5 Proxy computer application, and realize the simultaneous operation of hundreds of devices. PIA S5 Proxy  Group Control APP is provided free of charge, without additional charge, and does not require the same network environment. It is suitable for e-commerce marketing, games, traffic acquisition, live broadcast and other scenarios, quickly access the Internet, and enhance your online privacy.

√ Free to use
√ No restrictions on the same network environment and the number of devices
√ Support for use on real devices and simulators
√ Simple operation, one computer can manage all mobile devices

[Main features]
Centralized management: Free batch management of iOS devices, unified configuration and control, and simplified management process.
Security guarantee: Advanced encryption technology can ensure data transmission security.
Device support: Support for use on real devices and simulators, one computer can manage all iOS devices.
Real-time monitoring: Provide real-time device status monitoring to help enterprises and individuals grasp the operation status in time and optimize resource allocation.
Flexible configuration: No restrictions on the same network environment and the number of devices.
User-friendly: Simple and intuitive interface design, easy to use.

[How to start using PIA S5 Proxy  Group Control APP]
Step 1: Install  Group Control APP and log in to the same account on mobile devices and computers
Step 2: Select the proxy or filter you want to use and save
Step 3: Click Connect on your mobile device to start using the proxy
That's it! You can now browse the Internet with unified configuration and control of multiple mobile devices.

PS. If you have feature requests for PIA S5 Proxy  Group Control APP or want to report a bug, please contact us at support@piaproxy.com.

xTerminal - Your Ultimate SSH Terminal Shell

xTerminal is your all-in-one SSH terminal client for managing servers with speed and security. Whether you're an IT professional or a developer, xTerminal gives you the tools to easily connect, control, and manage your servers from anywhere.

Key Features:
* Interactive SSH Terminal: A fast, reliable terminal for executing commands on your servers. Eg: Use top to monitor system status or follow logs with tail -f.
* Powerful Editor: Edit documents with vi/vim just like on a desktop, with full support for CTRL and arrow keys, making your SSH terminal experience smooth.
* Multi-Session Management: Manage multiple SSH connections at once. Add, remove, and switch between sessions with ease, boosting your productivity.
* Snippets: Save and organize frequently used SSH commands. Quickly search by name, command, or label, making repeated tasks quicker and simpler.
* Device Management: Add your SSH servers, group them by labels, and search by name, host, or labels. Connect via password or public key authentication.
* Advanced SSH Options: Support for SSH jump hosts and SOCKS5 proxies for enhanced security and flexible connections.
* SFTP for File Management: Upload, download, edit, move, and delete files using the built-in SFTP, allowing you to manage files on your servers directly from the terminal.
* Keep Sessions Alive: Use “Keep Awake” and “Keep Alive” features to maintain persistent SSH connections without interruptions.
* User-Friendly Interface: Simple navigation with pull-to-refresh, search highlights, sortable lists, and drag-and-drop to reorder devices or snippets.
* Live Ping Monitoring: Check device connectivity in real-time with ping stats, including ms and TTL, helping you monitor the health of your network.
* Discover Network Devices: Easily find and save neighboring network devices for quick access later.
* Secure Port Knocking: Add an extra layer of protection by using port knocking to guard your servers from unauthorized access.
* Enhanced Security: Use TouchID/FaceID to protect your SSH sessions, ensuring secure access to your terminal on app launch or resume.
* iCloud Sync: Backup and restore your device and snippet lists across all iOS devices, ensuring seamless access to your settings anywhere.
* Copy & Paste: Effortlessly run commands from the clipboard or copy terminal output, streamlining your workflow in the terminal.
* Universal App: Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, giving you a consistent experience across devices.
* Secure Data Storage: All credentials and data are stored securely on your device, so you can rest assured your information is safe.
* Batch Execution: Execute commands on multiple servers at once and view all the outputs in one go.
* Startup Snippets: Set up essential commands to run on app startup, giving you immediate access to critical tasks as soon as you connect.

xTerminal is built for anyone needing a fast, reliable, and secure SSH terminal. It’s perfect for managing remote servers on various platforms, including macOS, Linux, OpenBSD, FreeBSD, NetBSD, Solaris, and OpenVMS.

Termix is a modern SSH client and terminal developed by a European team of cybersecurity experts. It offers an unrivaled SSH and SFTP experience that enhances your productivity without compromising your privacy.

With zero ads and a strict no-data-collection policy, Termix uses the most secure open-source libraries to keep your connections safe.

Key Features:

Ultimate SSH & SFTP Client:

Termix delivers a robust, desktop-grade terminal experience across all Apple devices.

Advanced File Manager & Code Editor:

Inspired by WinSCP, our fully featured file manager lets you download, upload, manage, and edit files, directories, and permissions effortlessly. It also includes a rich code editor with syntax highlighting that supports over 40 programming languages.

Native Gestures & Keyboard Shortcuts:

Navigate like a pro with native touch gestures and hardware keyboard shortcuts, enabling fast navigation, multiline command editing, and precise text selection. Termix feels just like a regular text editor with all the perks you need for efficient terminal work.

Multi-Session & Customization:

Work in parallel with seamless split-screen support, advanced key management (including generation and uploading), and a fully customizable interface with themes tailored for power users.

Serverless Security:

Termix works completely serverless. All your hosts, private keys, and passwords are stored in encrypted form on Apple iCloud and never leave your device. This design guarantees that your sensitive data remains exclusively under your control.

Enhanced Automation:

Boost your workflow with startup snippets, execute commands across multiple hosts simultaneously, and configure environment variables with ease.

Modern Apple-Native Design:

Experience a clean, smooth, and beautifully modern interface designed exclusively for Apple products.

Developer & Sysadmin Focused:

Built for developers and loved by system administrators, Termix includes features such as command history, regex search, and snippet support to save hours of time and increase productivity.

With Termix Pro, you can also:

- Upload and edit files using the File Manager.
- Create startup snippets.
- Execute snippets on multiple hosts simultaneously.
- Import custom fonts.
- Manage and configure environment variables.  
- Choose an alternative icon for Termix.

Discover the most powerful, secure, and feature-rich SSH and SFTP client made for those who demand quality. Get Termix today and transform your remote management experience!

NeoServer offers a comprehensive management solution via SSH for servers, NAS, and Linux-based routers on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Key features include terminal remote connections, multi-server script execution, container management, SFTP file management, and performance data visualization.

Free Features:
- Supports SFTP browsing, editing, renaming, deleting, viewing file size and permissions, file upload and download.
- Enables script running, viewing historical records, and batch execution on server groups.
- Displays server monitoring status, including CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics with widgets.
- Provides uptime, system load, CPU temperature, CPU model, CPU usage rate, GPU usage, task on GPU.
- Displays disk IOPS, I/O Wait, read/write speed, total read/write size.
- Shows network upload/download speed, total upload/download size, network card details, IP binding, network card status.
- Supports SSH remote connection with enhanced terminal functionality including script initialization, tmux, auto-completion, and double-click tab trigger.
- Offers process list management with sorting and kill signal functions.
- Manages Docker/Podman containers, viewing logs, inspection information, and container image management.
- Includes iOS 17 Widgets.
- Allows SSH server configuration, including password and key management, jump hosts, and SOCKS5 connections. Supports Wake-on-LAN (WOL).
- Provides iCloud synchronization (using private iCloud space), FaceID app unlocking.
- Supports Apple multiplatform: iOS/macOS, iPadOS.

Premium Version:
- Offers terminal themes and script execution in terminal.
- Enables advanced container operations: create, restart, stop.
- Allows SFTP file editing.
- Supports Socks Proxy and Jump Server.
- Enhances batch server script execution.

◉ NeoServer is popular among NAS (Synology, TrueNAS, QNAP, FreeNAS) players, self-hosting enthusiasts, website master, AI model researcher, and developers.

◉ NeoServer is best iPhone, iPad alternatives for putty,termux,juicessh

◉ Feedback and issues contact: h2eros.z@gmail.com.

◉ Data Privacy:

All data is stored on your device. NeoServer does not transmit data over the network to any servers outside of your configured servers, nor does it engage in any third-party statistics or advertising connections.

A software development tool for compiling and running C language on mobile devices, with built-in basic environment integrating Python and Lua.
Support the execution of Linux basic commands on the console.

The implementation principle adopts the compilation mode of llvm and clang.
https://github.com/phoenixlabcn/llvm-project


Function introduction:
The code is highlighted, which is more intuitive
Split screen display is supported in horizontal screen mode
Console output and input, supporting the output of specific error stack information
Theme and font size setting, moving cursor, convenient reading and simple operation

Supported Linux commands include:
ls,lli,ifconfig,ping,readlink,chmod,clang,telnet,host,du,link,dig,egrep,bc,date,gzip,nslookup,python2,fgrep,mv,md5,say,luac,ssh-keygen,xargs,diff,cd,tee,chksum,lua,touch,dc,tar,chflags,rm,sort,uniq,awk,printenv,chgrp,find,mkdir,tail,df,pwd,opt,chown,gunzip,compress,llvm-link,nc,uptime,sed,setenv,stat,uname,sum,head,wc,cat,echo,unsetenv,unlink,rmdir,uncompress,curl,ln,cp,whoami,rlogin,tr,env,whois,python,grep,nm,clear,sh,exit,open,python3

Code editor is optimized text editor focused on coding. It contains necessary features including syntax highlight, code assist, auto-complete, compile and execute, etc.

Features:

- Syntax highlighting for over 110 languages (C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, Markdown, PHP, Perl, Python, Lua, Dart, etc).
- Include online compiler, can compile and run over 30 common languages (Python, PHP, Java, JS/NodeJS, C/C++, Rust, Pascal, Haskell, Ruby, etc).
- Code assist, folding and auto-completion.
- Easily navigate between multiple tabs.
- Undo and redo changes without limit.
- Search and replace with regular expressions.
- Show or hide line numbers.
- Highlight matching parentheses.
- Automatic indent and outdent.
- Displays invisible characters.
- Open files from recently opened file collections.
- Preview HTML and Markdown files.
- Includes Emmet support for web development.
- Access files from FTP and WebDAV.
- Evaluate JavaScript code with built-in JavaScript console.
- Integrate and easy access to GitHub and GitLab.
- Access files from Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive.
- Dark and light themes and over 30 syntax highlighting styles.

If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us: support@rhmsoft.com

ProScan – Your Smart PDF, Word & Text Scanning Assistant
ProScan helps you scan, convert, and manage documents quickly and professionally – right from your phone.
Whether you’re studying, working, or handling urgent paperwork, the app delivers a smooth, convenient experience for scanning, compressing, merging, splitting, and sharing files effortlessly.

KEY FEATURES
Smart Document Scanning
Open the camera to capture documents with auto edge detection.
Instantly convert images into PDF / Word / Text formats.
Edit before saving: crop, rotate, enhance, and apply black-and-white filters.
Export high-quality files, ready for sharing or printing.
Flexible PDF Compression
Reduce PDF file size without losing image quality.
Choose compression level: Low / Medium / High to fit your needs.
Save storage space and share files faster.
Easy PDF Merge & Split
Select multiple files and combine them into a single PDF in just a few taps.
Split PDFs by page range – fast, accurate, and convenient.
Efficient File Management
Rename, delete, share, or open PDFs directly within the app.
Keep your documents organized and easy to find.
View and interact with PDFs seamlessly.

ADVANCED IMAGE PROCESSING TECHNOLOGY
Automatically detects and aligns document edges using AI.
Enhances scan quality by reducing shadows and improving sharpness.
Accurately recognizes text (OCR), allowing you to extract content from images.


 WHY YOU’LL LOVE ProScan
Turn paper documents into digital files in seconds.
Easily edit, compress, and merge your files.
Work and study efficiently — no computer needed.
Simple, clean interface that anyone can use.

DATA SECURITY
All files are stored locally on your device.
You can delete them anytime — no uploads to external servers.
No user data collection – complete privacy guaranteed.
PROSCAN IS PERFECT FOR:
Students and teachers who need to scan study materials.
Office workers, accountants, and administrative staff.
Individuals who want to quickly store or share documents.
Anyone who needs a convenient tool to scan, merge, compress, and manage PDFs anytime, anywhere.

Quick Chat - Web Chat Access – Elevate Your Messaging Experience
Since 2018, Quick Chat - Web Chat Access has been the go-to app for iPhone users seeking to enhance their messaging. We've crafted a powerful suite of tools designed to streamline communication, foster positive interactions, and bring unparalleled convenience to your fingertips. With our latest update, we've refined the user interface, strengthened security, and introduced exciting new features that make managing your messages easier and more enjoyable than ever.
Key Features
* Seamless Synchronization – Instantly sync your iPhone with messaging services using a simple QR code scan. Our effortless setup ensures you can start enjoying your messaging experience without delay.
* AI Chatbot Assistant – Engage with our intelligent chatbot to help you manage your messages more efficiently. Whether you need quick answers, reminders, or help with organizing conversations, the AI assistant is ready to assist 24/7.
* Extensive Status Library – Browse through a vast collection of status updates, from motivational quotes to heartfelt messages. Perfect for sharing across your messaging apps and social media platforms.
* Custom Chat Creation – Craft personalized chat conversations to entertain, inspire, or engage your social network in creative ways. Let your imagination run wild!
* Stylish Text with Creative Fonts – Make your messages stand out with unique fonts that add personality and flair to your chats. Express yourself like never before.
* Secure Image-to-Text Conversion – Utilize our offline OCR technology to extract text from images without uploading data to the cloud, ensuring complete privacy and data security.
* Advanced Security Options – Protect your messages with passcode and biometric authentication. Keep your conversations secure and accessible only to you.
* Promoting Positive Communication – We foster a safe and supportive messaging environment, encouraging respectful and meaningful interactions.
How It Works
1. Open Quick Chat - Web Chat Access on your iPhone to display the QR code.
2. Use another device to scan the QR code and sync your messaging service effortlessly.
Feedback & Support
We love hearing from you! If you're enjoying Quick Chat - Web Chat Access, please consider leaving us a rating. For questions or suggestions, reach out to us directly through the app—we're here to help.
Streamline your messaging with Quick Chat - Web Chat Access—where security, creativity, and convenience come together.
Privacy & Security
Your privacy is our top priority. Quick Chat - Web Chat Access does not collect, store, or share any user data. All data related to your usage of the app, including downloads and interactions, is stored locally on your device and is never transmitted to external servers.
Disclaimer:
Quick Chat - Web Chat Access is an independent app and is not affiliated with WhatsApp Inc. or any other third-party platforms. Our app is designed to enhance your messaging experience. We encourage users to respect privacy and copyright when sharing content. Always obtain permission before reusing content from downloaded statuses.
